chapters.title: Chapter 17: Questions of Control
chapters.info: Hopper, p. 283—One of the wolves. Hopper died in a Trolloc attack in real life, but he lives on in the World of Dreams, Tel'aran'rhiod. He is usually the first (and often only) wolf that finds Perrin there. Perrin thinks he would laugh as hard as a wolf could laugh at the title “Wolf King.” The last time Perrin was in the World of Dreams—what he calls the Wolf Dream—he tried to kill Hopper.
